assertion.value: The authors have no competing interests to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent for publication of clinical details and clinical images was obtained from the legally authorized representative and the patient’s family. The study protocol and consent procedure was approved by the Western Institutional Review Board (WIRB; study number 20120789).
